breathtestcore 0.8.0.9001

Read 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen

Source: R/read_iris.R
read_iris.Rd

Reads composite files with 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen. The composite files start as follows:

"Testergebnis"
"Nummer","1330"
"Datum","10.10.2013"
"Testart"
read_iris(filename = NULL, text = NULL)

Arguments

filename

name of IRIS/Wagner file in composite format
text

alternatively, text can be given as string

Value

List of class breathtest_data with file_name, patient_name, patient_first_name, test, identifikation, and data frame data with time and dob

Examples

read_iris,Read 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen,Read 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen — read_iris,Source: R/read_iris.R,read_iris.Rd,character(0),read_iris,character(0),list(title = "Description", contents = "
Reads composite files with 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen.\nThe composite files start as follows:
\n\"Testergebnis\"\n\"Nummer\",\"1330\"\n\"Datum\",\"10.10.2013\"\n\"Testart\"
\n"),list(description = "Reads composite files with 13C data from IRIS/Wagner Analysen.\nThe composite files start as follows:\n\"Testergebnis\"\n\"Nummer\",\"1330\"\n\"Datum\",\"10.10.2013\"\n\"Testart\"\n"),read_iris(filename = NULL, text = NULL),list(list(name = "filename", description = "
name of IRIS/Wagner file in composite format
"), list(name = "text", description = "
alternatively, text can be given as string
")),TRUE,
filename = btcore_file("IrisMulti.TXT")
cat(readLines(filename, n = 10), sep="\n")

#> "Testergebnis"
#> "Nummer","22"
#> "Datum","12.06.2009"
#> "Testart"
#> "Name","Magenentleerung fest"
#> "Abkürzung","GE FEST"
#> "Substrat","Natriumoktanoat"
#> "Molekulargewicht [g/mol]","0"
#> "13C-Atome/Molekül","1"
#> "Anreicherung [%]","0"
#
iris_data = read_iris(filename)
str(iris_data)

#> List of 23
#>  $ patient_id  : chr "1871960"
